From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure a virtual local area network (VLAN) as a remote switched port analyzer (RSPAN) VLAN, use the **remote-span** command in config-VLAN mode. To remove the RSPAN designation, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

ExtraInfo: This command is not supported in the VLAN database mode.You can enter the **show vlan remote-span** command to display the RSPAN VLANs in the CiscoÂ 7600 series router.

RelatedCmds.description: Displays a list of RSPAN VLANs.
